Articles.Content:
Hello, this is my first Mod in Kerbal Space Program.

Here is a Video with the 0.1 Version Features:

-----------------------|

http://youtu.be/SAzfl71Y7zw

And here is a list of the Features:

-8 Different Blocks (Sand, Grass, Dirt, Stone, Coal Ore, Iron Ore, Cobblestone.)

-You can walk on the Blocks

-------------------|

Downloadlink:

/removed by moderator/

----------------------------------------|

Changelog:

0.1:

Released Mod

-Added 8 Blocks

Issues:

Lags on Bad Computers. (Which mod doesn't?)

0.2:

*Coming Soon*

------------------------------------------|

Thanks for downloading!

Edited June 2, 2013 by M5000
Uploaded/released MC content without permissions.
I have to admit this would be really amusing. I can't wait to see what people come up with.
Orbital Islands

I have to admit this would be really amusing. I can't wait to see what people come up with.

Let's hope for some awesome builds.

What about Minecraft-like parts(pod, decupler, fuel, engine...)

This is somehow useless.

(Tut mir leid, BlueSubstance, ist nicht persÃƒÂ¶mlich gemeint.)
Its not supposed to have a specific use. Its just a fun little random mod.
I don't know what to say to this.

Orbital Islands

Well... I wouldn't have thought of that.

Orbital Islands

using the quantum struts glitch, assuming it still exists (strut ends on a strut box thingy, or wheel and it freezes objects in space) this could be epic
Do they contain fuel? If so, I'm doing a MÃƒÂ¼nar beach.
Why so many dislikes? This is my first mod, and it doesn't have a use for now.
Haha, awesome.

Why so many dislikes? This is my first mod, and it doesn't have a use for now.

looks like ya only got 1 person with distasteful reply, and i wouldn't worry to much about that, people for the mostpart are jerks =P

question:about how big are the blocks? keep in mind ive never played minecraft
It was only time before someone made this. All I can think of is orbiting minecraft islands. Hell yeah.

Orbital Islands
using the quantum struts glitch, assuming it still exists (strut ends on a strut box thingy, or wheel and it freezes objects in space) this could be epic

Starcraft platforms anyone?

looks like ya only got 1 person with distasteful reply, and i wouldn't worry to much about that, people for the mostpart are jerks =P

question:about how big are the blocks? keep in mind ive never played minecraft

Blocks in mine craft are one metre cubed

Why so many dislikes? This is my first mod, and it doesn't have a use for now.

I think some people are touchy you mixed minecraft with KSP, it's sort of a killer to some. Chin up, don't lose sleep over ungrateful people.
This is really a great mod, don't let others make you feel down. I am looking forward to seeing more stuff like this.
I am so going to make a airship with this and hooligan labs

Why so many dislikes? This is my first mod, and it doesn't have a use for now.

Some people feel that it's "The minecraft audience" bringing this game down. I don't think that's entirely true, but for good measure you might want to think about not making minecraft based mods.

Some people feel that it's "The minecraft audience" bringing this game down. I don't think that's entirely true, but for good measure you might want to think about not making minecraft based mods.

Probly the most horrible advice I have ever seen on kerbal forums...

Probly the most horrible advice I have ever seen on kerbal forums...

Could you not insult my abillity to give advice. I'm just sharing what I know. The hostility is not welcomed.

If anyone is 'bringing the game down' its close minded people. And honestly I meant no hostility in that, just didn't want this mods dev to get discouraged.

Its a single player modders game.....saying 'don't make this, don't make that' kinda goes against the whole spirit of that idea.

On a side note:

This mod + HL runways and some struts = awesome ramps for rocket powered cars....good fun!!!

Edited June 2, 2013 by KhaosCorp
side note

I've closed the thread because the OP did not obtain proper permissions to use MC content, then uploaded it and allowed others to access it.

Please be advised that it is a direct violation of section 4.2 of the KSP Forum Rules to do this. Always remember to read, understand, and obey the rules!

Thanks!

-M5K
